query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `codingChallenges` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `interviewId` int NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` text NOT NULL,
  `language` enum('python','javascript','java','cpp') NOT NULL,
  `starterCode` text,
  `testCases` text,
  `difficulty` enum('easy','medium','hard') NOT NULL,
  `timeLimit` int,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `codingChallenges_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `codingChallenges_interviewId_fk` FOREIGN KEY (`interviewId`) REFERENCES `interviews`(`id`)
);
